name: Data Science Project-based Internship Home Credit Indonesia x Rakamin Academy
desc: A project-based internship in data science covering business understanding, data analysis, and machine learning and developed a model for loan prediction.

The process involved exploratory data analysis to gain actionable insights for stakeholders, data preprocessing, feature selection for machine learning, model training, and hyperparameter tuning for predicting loan repayment success.

name: UI/UX Design Project-based Internship Gamelab Indonesia
desc: Designed a responsive website aligning the user experience design.
Created wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups to visualize and refine the design.
Conducted usability testing to address users' pain points.
Received positive feedback for the effective design solutions.
